column4: i just got the laptop, its pretty old. I just want to get wirless working, I cant plug it in to the net cause i am stealing my net from my neighbor. I need the hardware driver so i can install it,
is there anyplace i can download it from?
the guy knows im using it.
my net gets turned on next week
if you know what wireless card you have, then you can download what you need, and then install it
